name: MyDiabetesLifestyle
0:
”Alexa open my diabetes lifestyle”
”Alexa, ask My Diabetes Lifestyle about reducing pain”
”Alexa, ask My Diabetes Lifestyle about exercises”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my diabetes lifestyle
Developer Terms of Use
des:
My Diabetes Lifestyle is providing life-changing information, lifestyle strategies, and news on innovative products to help successfully navigate type 1, type 2 and prediabetes. Ask My Diabetes Lifestyle about topics, symptoms, treatments, nutrients, medical terms and diets. You can also ask for the latest diabetes news or play a quiz.

The team members behind My Diabetes Lifestyle are informed, medically inclined diabetic writers who produce articles that help the diabetic public seeking knowledge and answers to living a healthier diabetic life. 

To start, just say "Alexa, launch My Diabetes Lifestyle" or "Alexa, open My Diabetes Lifestyle".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"

The information in this skill is not intended to substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. We are not medical doctors. We merely share thoughts about possible diabetes management — subject to your medical doctor’s or qualified medical provider’s final professional advice. Always consult your medical doctor or other qualified health provider before making changes to your diabetes management. By the same token, always seek their advice regarding any questions you may have with respect to any medical condition, diabetes or other. Neither postpone seeking, nor disregard, their professional medical advice because of the information found within this skill. We do not endorse or recommend any opinions, positions, procedures, tests, or products found in this skill; these are intended for educational and informational purposes only and, not intended to substitute or replace your consultation with a medical doctor or qualified medical professional.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
